code: import{API}from"../../backend";export var getmeToken=function getmeToken(userId,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"payment/gettoken/").concat(userId),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var processPayment=function processPayment(userId,token,paymentInfo){return fetch("".concat(API,"/payment/braintree/").concat(userId),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(paymentInfo)}).then(function(reponse){return reponse.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};
